name: Singularity (itch) (marcell_123455)
description:
If you have UI scaling issues or the game looks streched and has boarders please exit and enter the fullscreen mode again.

Made this for my first game jam! Singularity is a shooter game where you play as a ninja and have to make your way through four levels using guns, grenades and a sword! Experience the game from two perspective: Top down and first person!
Thanks for playing my game ;)
